description: This pullover's brushed fleece is crafted from recycled polyester, reinforcing Ralph Lauren's aim to create the highest-quality products with minimal harm to the environment.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 28" body length (front and back), a 19¼" shoulder, a 45" chest, and a 34½" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Side on-seam zip pockets. Elasticized hem.
Signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
Made with recycled polyester, which helps reduce environmental impact by avoiding the use of virgin polyester, a petroleum-based material.
Visit corporate.RalphLauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style for more information on Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.
